node_1: assistant commissioner of police officer arun verma
edge: character in
role played by an unspecified character in
friend of Javed Abbas in
Javed was shot dead by an unknown assailant, who could potentially be the traitor being sought after.
Geeta is Javed's friend.
After meeting Arun, Geeta falls in love with him at first sight. However, Arun does not show any special interest in her and avoids her.
As Javed's best friend, Arun decides to adopt Javed's children instead of sending them to an orphanage after Javed's death.
As their relationship develops and time goes on, Arun begins to develop feelings for Geeta.
In a visit to KKV's club to threaten him, Arun unexpectedly finds that Geeta is a dancer at that club.
Arun becomes angry with Geeta because he thinks being a bar dancer is a filthy job and that Geeta has been cheating him by pretending to be decent.
The children all say that Geeta was with them the whole day and never once left, leaving Arun to believe that the bar dancer is another person that simply looks like Geeta.
Under the pressure of his living situation, Arun robs KKV and steals a large amount of drug money from KKV, knowing it's dirty money.

The film grossed ₹11.20 crore in India and $565,000 in other countries, for a worldwide total of ₹13.82 crore against its ₹12 crore budget. It had a worldwide opening weekend of ₹4.89 crore and grossed ₹8.01 crore in its first week.
AR Rahman composed the soundtrack of the film
The lyrics were written by Majrooh Sultanpuri and Mehboob.
